full_summary:
### Emergency Medical Responder Program (EMR-PRG)

#### Tender Notice
* **Title**: Emergency Medical Responder Program
* **Reference Number**: cb-774-39761116
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-12
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-07, 14:00 EST
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence

#### Program Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a contractor to design, produce, and maintain a bilingual Emergency Medical Responder (EMR) Program, designating DND as an authorized provider of all levels of the program. Approximately 600 individuals, overseen by DND, attend certification or recertification courses across Canada each year. The program must be delivered in both official languages of Canada, with approximately 69 instructors and 22 instructor-trainers managing course delivery.

#### Program Requirements
The contractor is expected to provide all hard copy textbooks, electronic course materials, and access to an online web portal for students and instructors to access course materials, such as course certificates, soft copy textbooks, exams, and training materials. The contractor must also provide EMR training, transitional training, and administrative support.

#### Contract Period and Options
The initial contract period is from the contract award date to March 31, 2025, with four (4) one-year option periods. Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Languages and Documents
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada, and the contractor is expected to provide services in both languages.

#### Instructions for Qualification and Proposals
Please refer to the [RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27361/w6369-23-a051-emr-program-rfp-amendment-001-english.pdf) for instructions on qualification and proposal submission.

Thank you for your time. The contract request can be found in another tab, attached bellow.
